item.description:
Come out and enjoy the Playoffs!!!

Tickets are still available through Ticketmaster.com for the New England Patriots vs. Baltimore Ravens 1:00 PM - January 10, 2010 at Gillette Stadium.

If you are going to the game, planning to buy tickets on your own through Ticketmaster, and/or want to tailgate - let us know and we will set it up.

Email or call Lonnie @ 401-829-8516 for tailgating set-up.

We estimate starting to tailgate 10:00AM-11:00AM January 10, 2010 @ Gillette Stadium.
item.how_to_find_us: Call and/or email interest to set up tailgating plans 401-829-8516 - Lonnie
item.name: Patriot Playoff Tickets and Tailgating at Gillette Stadium
